price: তেওঁ ক’লে, ‘নিশ্চয় এওঁলোক হৈছে মোৰ অতিথি; এতেকে তোমালোকে মোক অপমান নকৰিবা’।
arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيۡفِي فَلَا تَفۡضَحُونِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla inna hāulāi ḍayfī falā tafḍaḥūni
